title: Venezuela 's budget balance in relation to GDP 2018
yAxis: Budget balance in relation to GDP
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Budget balance in relation to GDP, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately positive which exists from 2014 to 2010.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2018 to 2015.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2010 to 2008.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2015 to 2014.
gold: The statistic shows Venezuela 's budget balance in relation to GDP between 2008 and 2017 , with projections up until 2018 . A positive value indicates a budget surplus , a negative value indicates a deficit . In 2017 , the budget deficit of Venezuela amounted to around 16.61 percent of GDP .
